page.title: 13FOUR MARKS SCHOOL:GAMES
page.content: GAMES CHILDREN PLAY: The children in Four Marks school make up some of their own games. It's much more fun because you can make your own set of rules. One of the games we play is called "Victory". A group of people stand in a half circle, a Catcher is chosen then the Catcher picks one person to run to the other side of the playground to another half circle. If that person gets to the other side before the Catcher taps them they shout "Victory". The group of people then have to run to the other side as well. Anyone who is caught has to help catch. This goes on until one person is left.
